All Classes

Class Description
ActivateProductionController
This class represents the controller of the activate production scene of the GUI application.
ActivateProductionTurn
class to manage the turn to activate productions
AdditionalProduction
This class represents the special ability of leader cards of additional production.
AdditionalProductionView
This class is the visualization of the additional production view for the user
AdditionalProductionVisualization
This class contains the representation of an additional production
AllPlayersView
This class permit to a player to view other player's board or section of the board
BaseProduction
This class is the visualization of the base production
BiggerDeposit
This class represents the special ability of leader cards of increment capacity of the deposit.
Box
Class Box
BoxTest
This class tests the Box class.
BuyDevelopmentCardTurn
Class to manage the turn to buy development cards
BuyDevelopmentController
This class represents the controller of the buy development card scene of the GUI application.
CardColor
Enum class for DevelopmentCards color
ChooseLineToServer
This class represents the event to send to the server with the line of the market that tha player choose to take.
ClientStart
This class permits to the user to select gui or cli view
CLIHandler
This class visualizes all the information of the player and game board, take the input from the various view handler and send the data to the server
ConnectionToClient
This class is the remote view of the MVC patter.
ConnectionToServer
This class handles the send of information from the client to the server Implements Runnable and EventToServerNotifier interface
Controller
Class to control and manage the game
ControllerConnection
This class implements the EventToServerVisitor and ObserveConnectionToClient interface.
CostLess
This class represents the special ability of leader cards of decrement the purchase cost of the development cards
DevelopmentCard
DevelopmentCard is a class who represent a DevelopmentCard
DevelopmentCardException  
DevelopmentCardHandler
DevelopmentCardHandler manages the Player's DevelopmentCards during the play
DevelopmentCardHandlerTest
this class tests the development card handler and its behaviour These test uses an ArrayList of DevelopmentCards created from the DevelopmentCardTest.json to create the DevelopmentCard.
DevelopmentCardSymbols
This enum contains all the symbols needed to represent a Development Card
DevelopmentCardTest
This class tests the DevelopmentCard class.
DevelopmentCardToClient
This class contains the information of the development card to send to the client.
DevelopmentCardView
This class handles the view for the buy of development card, the activation of development card and the position of the development card asked by the user depending on the constructor and handler used
DevelopmentCardVisualization
This class represents the visualization of a development card
DiscardInitialLeaderCards
This class represents the event to send to the server with the initial leader card thath the player choose to discard.
DisconnectionHandler
This class handle the disconnection of the client from the room.
EndGame
Class to manage and control the end of the game
EndGameToClient
This class represents the end game event to send to the client.
EventHandlerCLI
This class is an event parser, takes the information from the events received from the server and then calls the CLIHandler to visualize them
EventHandlerGUI
This class implements the EventToClientVisitor interface.
EventToClient
This abstract class is used to generalize the event to sent from the server to the client.
EventToClientNotifier
This interface contains the list of methods that the server could use to send different events to the client.
EventToClientVisitor
This interface contains the list of the event that the client could receive from the server.
EventToServer
This abstract class is used to generalize the event to sent from the client to the server.
EventToServerInitial
This abstract class is used to generalize the initial event to sent from the client to the server.
EventToServerInitialVisitor
This interface contains the list of the event of the initial connection of the client to the server.
EventToServerNotifier
This interface contains the list of methods that the client could use to send different events to the server.
EventToServerVisitor
This interface contains the list of the event that the server could receive form client.

Class Faithtrack

This class handles the visualization of the faith track

WaitingOtherPlayers
This class is only a thread that prints 3 dots in sequence and then delete them, it's implemented as a class extending thread because the thread will be interrupted and it's necessary to create always a new thread because an interrupted thread cannot be restarted
